bullets: Service provider firm/company must submit all related documents/certificates at the time of registration.
Registration of agency and its employees is mandatory under Contract Labour (Regulation & Abolition) Act, 1952 and with State Insurance Corporation.
Registration of agency and service provider (GST) in the concerned department is mandatory.
Registration of agency in the Labour Department is mandatory.
Service provider must have experience of similar work in Gov/PSU/Gov. Ltd company in the last 3 years, with work orders of 80%, 50%, or 40% of estimated value; related documents must be submitted.
Bidder agency must submit income tax returns for the last three years.
Bidder must submit a 10x10 cm stamp paper declaration that the firm has never been blacklisted.
Service provider must attach proof of depositing EPF and ESI for employees.
Service provider agency must have ISO 9001 and 14000 certification; proof must be attached.
Service provider agency must have an office/branch in Uttar Pradesh; proof must be attached. After selection, within 15 days, a branch office must be established in Lucknow.
Service provider company must provide a certificate that none of its officers/employees or their relatives are associated with the department.
The number of workers shown in the bid may be increased or decreased as per government work requirements.
The agency's annual turnover should be at least 30% of the estimated bid value; CA certificate required. Must provide 3 years' audited balance sheet.
Bid security of Rs. 1,55,330/- must be submitted in FDR/TDR form; EMD of unsuccessful bidders will be refunded as per rules.

Service provider must deposit 5% of the total estimated value as security in the form of FDR/Bank Guarantee for 38 months in favor of Deputy Secretary, UP Police Recruitment and Promotion Board, Lucknow.
Currently working outsourced employees will be retained by the selected service provider; only new employees will be selected by the new agency.
Service provider/contractor must comply with EPF, ESI, etc., as per Service Level Agreement (SLA) and deposit within 14 days of the next month. Any penalty will be borne by the service provider.
Service provider cannot change any deployed employee on their own. In case of indiscipline or criminal activity, change can be made only with the department's consent.
Selection of new employees will be done as per government order no. 31/20/273/18-2-2020(ya0m0)2016TC, dated 25-08-2020, through sewayojan.up.nic.in, with service provider's participation.
In case of any complaint or dispute against the service provider, the decision of UP Police Recruitment and Promotion Board, Lucknow will be final.
Service provider company must have 3 years' experience of providing services in Lucknow; proof must be attached.
Service provider company must provide required male employees.
Company must provide a certificate that no legal case is pending against the employees provided; declaration must be attached.
Service charge rate will be fixed at 3.85%; payment will be made at this rate.
Employees provided by the company must be healthy and free from any communicable disease; certificate must be attached.
Service provider company must provide 15 skilled workers, including 1 electrician with ITI certificate, 1 plumber, 1 sweeper, and 12 guards with 3 years' experience; declaration must be attached.
Service provider must provide information about 2 drivers and ensure they have driving licenses; declaration must be attached.
Any dispute will be subject to the jurisdiction of courts in Lucknow.
ai_summary.summary: This document outlines the mandatory requirements and conditions for service provider agencies bidding to supply manpower to the UP Police Recruitment and Promotion Board, Lucknow. It details the necessary registrations, certifications, experience, documentation, and compliance with labor laws, as well as the process for employee selection, payment terms, and dispute resolution. The document emphasizes transparency, legal compliance, and the health and qualifications of the provided staff.
